snippet.title: Actress Kristen Bell pulling for Detroit
snippet.description: Originally from Detroit, Kristen Bell is a huge Detroit Red Wings fan who recently starred in the romantic comedy, “Forgetting Sarah Marshall,” opposite Jason Segel, Jonah Hill and Paul Rudd. For three seasons, Bell starred in the title role of the CW series “Veronica Mars” and her current projects include the Disney Studios film “When in Rome” and NBC’s hit series, “Heroes”. Bell attended New...
